name: HTMLVideoElement.videoWidth
description: The HTMLVideoElement interface's read-only videoWidth property indicates the intrinsic width of the video, expressed in CSS pixels. In simple terms, this is the width of the media in its natural size.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLVideoElement.videoWidth' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLVideoElement.videoWidth' in the 'HTML5' specification.
